name: Vein Hotel
description:
"Vein Hotel" 3D horror game, let's feel the fear!

Travelling is fun. One night, when I woke up, I found myself in a strange place, it was a very different hotel, and I began to explore where I was and escaped.

Warning! This game contains strong images, scary scenes and intense sounds.

In the maze, keep your eyes and follow the moving candles!

----------The meaning of 8 with prismatic-------------


8 and Prismatic is a homophonic in Chinese "Bully", It's a path for the feeling he never know.
